thread.title: Mamma Mia! Stars heading to Birmingham Hippodrome
thread.title_full: Mamma Mia! Stars heading to Birmingham Hippodrome

title: Mamma Mia! Stars heading to Birmingham Hippodrome
text:
This year’s pantomime is Aladdin, whose star-studded cast – including Marti Pellow as Abanazar – also sees Julian Clary, fresh from Wolverhampton panto season last year, as the Slave of the Ring. 
It runs from December 19 to January 31. Cats. 
Andrew Lloyd Webber’s Jesus Christ Superstar, which exploded onto the musical scene in 1971 and has continued to wow audiences ever since, will run from November 2 to November 7. 
There’s no better sign of Christmas than the arrival of Birmingham Royal Ballet’s production of The Nutcracker. What do you think? Be the first to comment 
There will be shows from November 27 to December 13. 
For more information, or to book tickets for any of the upcoming shows, click here or call 0844 338 5000. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
